# NEFilterPacketProvider.Verdict.drop

**Case**

A verdict to drop a packet.

## Declaration

```swift
case drop
```

## Verdicts

- **NEFilterPacketProvider.Verdict.allow**: A verdict to allow a packet.
- **NEFilterPacketProvider.Verdict.delay**: A verdict to delay a packet until a future verdict.
